html:
10.2.20  12:30 pm   Just like how C major sounds happy and C minor sounds sad, C major 7th sounds like a combination of both feelings, happy and sad at the same time.

Why is that?

      it all depends how you play it, but my best guess is that you can probably hear E minor in it somehow

10.2.20  11:38 am   does the sentence "2+2 has been 4 for so many darn years" (which is a great sentence) from "la de da de da de da de day oh" (which is a great song) refer somehow to the book 1984? 

      absolutely not

10.2.20  11:30 am   how are you enjoying the month of october so far

      i can hardly tell the difference

10.2.20  11:12 am   if you tell us what you think about if the song will come out before 2021 then you won't be chastised until 2021 because you won't be wrong until then, so you won't be sick of it because it won't be 2020

      i don't care what year it is. if you hear me say any thing about the year number, it is purely tongue-in-cheek

10.2.20  10:56 am   I had a dream your song came out on apple music, but I didn't listen to avoid spoilers for the video. Was that a good call?

      not on my part, because they are supposed to come out at the same time

10.2.20  10:11 am   what's your opinion?

      1=2

10.2.20  10:11 am   Are you on a long long long journey?

      ah, that would explain a lot

10.2.20  10:06 am   will your next video be out by 2020

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.2.20  10:05 am   how do i stop lucid dreaming

      start lucid screaming

10.2.20  9:23 am   Where do ideas come from?

      you

10.2.20  9:14 am   Is cereal a soup?

      at least

10.2.20  8:48 am   are feet shoes?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.2.20  7:56 am   opinion on languages?

      hours of fun, for the whole family

10.2.20  6:47 am   is there hope for humanity yet?

      yes

10.2.20  4:27 am   do you have any tips to git gud

      first check to see how good you already are, just to guard against the chance of some kind of overdose

10.2.20  4:04 am   Favourite cheese?

      woke up in nashville

10.2.20  2:47 am   why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

10.2.20  2:24 am   What type of genre of music do you make?

      normal

10.2.20  1:57 am   how do i eat a burger after the apocalypse?

      it will have to be in a comic book. you will be in a comic book by that time

10.2.20  12:38 am   How do I combat that doubtful voice in my head that prevents me from even trying to do new things?

     transcribe it in 400 different languages

     P.S. I really love the music and videos you make and this questions page, and I consider you a huge inspiration! Your stuff really helps pick me up when I'm feeling down. :)

     holy smokes, your demeanor has turned friendly

10.2.20  12:20 am   I know some things about music and can play some songs on the piano. Should I practice playing scales or just keep playing songs

      songs

10.1.20  11:58 pm   What's your opinion on bagels? I'm very concerned

      it's like meat, but different

10.1.20  11:08 pm   how to write good bass lines?

      you're gonna wanna write the song, instead of the bass line. however, in maybe 1 out of 50 songs, the bass line IS the song, and in that case you'll wanna go ahead and write the bass line. but that doesn't answer the question of how to write anything, and the answer to that is it has to write you, although i realize that seems counter-intuitive

10.1.20  10:04 pm   do you ever look up at the ceiling pretend it's the floor 

      not anymore

10.1.20  9:53 pm   What takes you longer, writing the song or making the video?

      making the video. but you left out an important part which is recording the song, which i do extremely separately from writing it, and also takes much longer than writing it

10.1.20  9:45 pm   do you ever feel like a plastic bag

      no

10.1.20  7:27 pm   when a melody comes to you in a dream (or i guess at any time really), does it have like...a timbre? or instrument?
(coming from someone who has never had a melody spontaneously enter my head this is baffling to me)

      it's the same as when you hear a melody in real life

10.1.20  5:25 pm   How do you feel about birds?

      pretty good

10.1.20  5:20 pm   can you give us a broad estimation of when your new video comes out

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.1.20  5:00 pm   what is music

      a hypnosis tool, used for propaganda enhancement

10.1.20  4:55 pm   how do you know when your lyrics are good enough for a song?

      it should give the same feeling as a breakthrough on the frontier of science

10.1.20  4:25 pm   Hey whats How do you make your videos so nicely 

      the trick is to make them way less nice than i wanted to, because if you try to make them too nice it's impossible

10.1.20  4:15 pm   Have you been asked when your next video is going to be released?

      no way

10.1.20  4:12 pm   can you tell me why your music fills me with overwhelming nostalgia even though I've only been listening to you for about a year now?

      could be that little bit of unicorn juice i've slipped in there

10.1.20  3:01 pm   What is it that inspired you to use the style you use?

     just trying to get by

      Or is this the style that just felt natural?

      think of it this way...... i can think of 9,999999999999999 styles that are impossible. then, just when i think all hope is lost, when i think there is no possible way that any styles are possible, i manage to find one that MIGHT be possible. and that's the way i'll have to do it

10.1.20  2:43 pm   why dont you release songs without videos and only release the most special songs with videos?

      due to greed, i assume

10.1.20  2:24 pm   why are you so awesome

      by giving myself the same name as you, i may have convinced you to see your own good qualities in others.... at least i am hoping that is what happened

10.1.20  2:07 pm   what are some wise ways to interact with plastic?

      recycle it?

10.1.20  1:53 pm   Which sandwich meat should I use to sculpt a pony out of? 

      pony

10.1.20  1:52 pm   how does a mirror work?

      they are almost 100% reflective. when you look at a mirror, you see the world, from the mirror's perspective, and also backwards

10.1.20  1:30 pm   will your new song come out before the election

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.1.20  1:20 pm   how do u suggest i make my first song?

      any way you can. if that's too many ways, then select the worst way, just to keep it interesting

10.1.20  12:55 pm   are you working on a large project

      it's supposed to be average sized

10.1.20  12:07 pm   can you write

      i'll see what i can do

10.1.20  11:52 am   How much of your lyrics are inspired by something 

      does everything count as something

10.1.20  11:49 am   Will your video contain anything spooky to celebrate the Halloween spirit in the air?

      no

10.1.20  11:41 am   what resources did you use to learn programming?

      computers, but let me clarify something: i still haven't learned most of programming

10.1.20  10:52 am   are dreams just movies made by your brain to keep you occupied while you are asleep

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.1.20  10:49 am   How much gravy is too much gravy?

      about 15 pounds

10.1.20  9:55 am   what are your opinions on cabbage?

      savage
